Description: Glazed steatite figure of a couchant goat with the prenomen of Thutmose IV inscribed on the back, longitudinally pierced, base inscribed with the same prenomen and decorated with a representation of Taweret.
Excavator/field collector: Field Collection by: Dr Joseph John Acworth
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2005-present, Swansea, Egypt Centre, LT Loan
Acquisition name: Donated by: Mrs Marion Whiteford Acworth JP
